description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
full_summary:
**[Government Tender Announcement]**

**[Reference Information]**
* Title: Parts, Switches, Accessories, Hardware
* Tender Reference Number: cb-751-71093104
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: W8482-241758/B
* Publication Date: 2023-12-13

**[Closing Information]**
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-22T14:00:00
* Tender Status: Expired

**[Procurement Information]**
* Procurement Category: Government of Canada (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Please consult Tender Description or Tender Documents
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia (CB) and Nova Scotia (NS)

**[Contract Information]**
* Contracting Entity: National Defence
* Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**[Notice Information]**
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Notice URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26983/w8482-241758---rfp---en_1.pdf (English)
* Notice URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26983/w8482-241758---rfp---fr_1.pdf (French)

**[Tender Description]**
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for parts, switches, accessories, and hardware items detailed in the attached Tender Description and Tender Documents. The delivery is requested at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

A total of thirty-six (36) items are listed, including housings, cabinets, casings, electrical switches, accessories, and several other specialized components. The Contractor is expected to submit prices in Canadian dollars, and bidders must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and National Company and Product Identification (NCAGE) code of the products they are offering.

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Please consult the attached Tender Description and Tender Documents for detailed information on the items and requirements.
